title: Strengthening Web Development Practical Competencies: Discussion-Based Learning Strategies for Designing Mathematics Classroom Discussions

context.prior_knowledge: Understanding of elementary mathematics concepts and basic proficiency in online learning tools
context.additional_context: Practical Competency Enhancement Program for IT/Software Development Professionals

learning_goals: Learners can design and facilitate various types of discussions (framing, conceptual, and application discussions).
Learners can select evaluation methods appropriate to the characteristics of each discussion type.
Learners can apply effective discussion facilitation strategies for large-scale online learning environments

constraints.tech_requirements: Limited tech environment (no PC, smartphone only)

difficulty: Easy - Simple structure with minimal constraints
